Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It crossed the sea and drifted ashore in a new land . Surviving in this place led it to take on a unique appearance and gain special powers.
Generation IX.Violet: This special Ursaluna can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
